Hi, my name is Micael Reis and I'm a Software Engineer from Portugal.

I just finished my M.Sc Degree in Software Engineering at University of Coimbra in Portugal, and I'm currently looking for a job as a Web Developer in the Netherlands.

I love programming and to learn new things, specially when it comes to my big passion, web development. My hobbies go from listen and playing music, to watch movies and series as well and doing sports.

In case you are interested and want to learn more about what I have been doing, you can check my projects, blog and also my volunteer work. Also, you can download my CV here!

If you want to reach out to me, send an email to micaelpreis@gmail.com.
